005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
009
010import java.net.URI;
011import java.util.List;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public class DefaultScopedContraints implements IScopedContraints {
016  @NonNull
017  private final URI namespace;
018  @NonNull
019  private final String shortName;
020  @NonNull
021  private final List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints;
022
023  /**
024   * Construct a new set of scoped constraints.
025   *
026   * @param namespace
027   *          the associated Module namespace
028   * @param shortName
029   *          the associated Module short name
030   * @param targetedConstraints
031   *          the set of constraints
032   * @see IModule#getXmlNamespace()
033   * @see IModule#getShortName()
034   */
035  public DefaultScopedContraints(
036      @NonNull URI namespace,
037      @NonNull String shortName,
038      @NonNull List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints) {
039    this.namespace = namespace;
040    this.shortName = shortName;
041    this.targetedConstraints = targetedConstraints;
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  public URI getModuleNamespace() {
046    return namespace;
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public String getModuleShortName() {
051    return shortName;
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public List<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedContraints() {
056    return targetedConstraints;
057  }
058
059}
